(My first post in NBWRGP when it was under control of BioStinger, was not 
moding.  Not to brag, I had had lots of RPGing experience.  Under the 
'rules', I brought in my craft, opened fire on the human village.  Proto 
(Crow Lord) posted it was destroyed.  Then I quit because of the 
non-essential e-mails)
